items.question: What products does Mihan Badak Garmsar offer?
items.answer: Our company manufactures various types of bobbins, wiring systems, regulators, and transistors with the highest quality. All products are produced according to international standards.

items.question: How can I ensure the quality of your products?
items.answer: All our products come with a 24-month quality guarantee. We use the finest raw materials and the most advanced production lines. Laboratory samples are also periodically inspected.

items.question: What is the delivery time for the products?
items.answer:
Delivery time varies depending on the product and order quantity:

- Ready products: 1‚Äì3 business days
- Custom products: 5‚Äì7 business days
- Bulk orders: upon coordination

You can always contact our sales department for more details.

items.question: Can I visit your production workshop?
items.answer: Yes, with prior coordination, you can visit our production lines. Visits are conducted on Sundays and Tuesdays every week from 9:00 to 12:00, observing all safety protocols.

items.question: What are the warranty conditions for your products?
items.answer:
Our product warranty includes the following:

‚úÖ 12-month unconditional replacement warranty
‚úÖ 10 years after-sales service
‚úÖ 24/7 technical support
‚úÖ Annual free inspection

Required documents: Purchase invoice and warranty stamp

about.title: About Mihan Yadak Garmsar
about.desc: Mihan Yadak Garmsar Company is the first and largest manufacturer of electric motorcycle parts in Iran with over 31 years of experience. Leveraging technical know-how, 9 registered national patents, and collaboration with technical-vocational institutes, it has taken effective steps in training mechanics and advancing the motorcycle industry.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.address: Tehran, Sales Office: Molavi St., before Razi Square, Bahman Passage, 3rd Floor, Unit

hero.title: A Recognized Name, Proven Quality
hero.description: Mihan Yadak Garmsar Industrial Manufacturing Company, the first and largest producer of electrical parts for various motorcycles in Iran with over a quarter of a century of experience and utilizing the expertise of capable engineers, with the use of advanced laboratory equipment and facilities and consultation with experienced and creative repairmen throughout Iran, is committed to customer satisfaction, effectiveness in improving quality, and the growth of Iran's motorcycle industry. Under the ownership and management of Haj Ali Mihan Doost in Garmsar County, Semnan Province, the company operates with the efforts of its capable production line personnel. Mihan Yadak Garmsar is proud to have obtained 9 invention patents in the motorcycle industry. With strong determination, the company has partnered with major Iranian companies such as Iran Khodro, Saipa, and Butan, and after extensive research and constructive interactions with the Technical and Vocational Training Organization, it has provided specialized training and scientific troubleshooting for new motorcycles to repairmen across the country. With the slogan 'A Recognized Name, Proven Quality' and holder of 9 invention patents in Iran's motorcycle industry, the company has taken a new step in cooperation with the Technical and Vocational Training Organization and the Chamber of Guilds to enhance the technical knowledge of motorcycle repairmen. By equipping more than 70 training workshops in vocational training centers in counties and developing competency standards for training (specialized familiarity and troubleshooting of electrical and electronic systems and the operation of fuel injection systems for Honda CDI 125 motorcycles and AC/DC Viu project), and issuing related training certificates using the expertise of capable technical experts (engineers and experienced repairmen), the company is currently training motorcycle repairmen throughout the country. In this regard, all repairmen and sellers of high-quality Mihan Yadak products are organized and become members of the large family of Mihan Yadak Garmsar Industrial Manufacturing Company under the Mechanized Mihan Plan.
